about_the_game:
A single player only PvE autobattler that is purely GUI (graphical user inteface). Manage dealt cards (units). Combine units to level them up. Upgrade items.

Survive 50 randomized rounds that are highly replayable. No other maps/campaings, no meta-progression.

How much content there is

Around 90+ different units, 60+ different enemies, and around 30 items. Enemies are placed on the board in various randomized configurations. There are a variety of skills, status effects and items.

There are additional difficulty modes such as instant-death and nightmare mode to provide more challenge for veteran players.

Gameplay

(The demo ends at 36 rounds rather than the full 50 rounds)

The game consists of 50 rounds, each lasting 50 seconds. Every 5 rounds, the game automatically saves to provide a checkpoint, limiting the potential for save-scumming strategies. Additionally, items are dispensed every 5 rounds.

Combine 3 units of the same name and level to level up the unit. Max level is 3.

No Metaprogression

No metaprogression so that players can simply jump in and play without thinking. 

Fast-forward Feature

Can speed up battles from 3X to 5X the speed.

Highly Optimized

Playable on lower end computers.

name: Auto GUI Battler Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics (with Opengl support)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: FFmpeg/FFplay compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz dual-core processor
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated graphics card (with Opengl support)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: FFmpeg/FFplay compatible sound card

short_description: A single player only PvE autobattler that is purely GUI (graphical user inteface). Keep or reroll dealt cards (units). Combine units to level them up. Upgrade items. Survive 50 randomized rounds that are highly replayable. No other maps/campaings, no meta-progression.
